entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 06:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: W 20 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
